section.title: Target of this exercise
section.para: In this exercise you add a toolbar to your application.

section.title: Adding a toolbar
section.para: Select the TrimBars node under your TrimmedWindow entry and press the Add... button. The Side attribute should be set to Top , so that all toolbars assigned to that trimbar appear on the top of the application.
Add a ToolBar model element to your TrimBar. Add a Handled ToolItem to this toolbar which points to the org.eclipse.ui.file.saveAll command.
Set the label for this entry to Save .

textobject.phrase: Adding a menu item to the menu

section.title: Validating
section.para: Validate that your save handler is called if you select Save from the menu or the toolbar.
